extendedInfo.description: Drive a Monster Truck across impossible terrains!Compare times and global rank!Some levels require speed, and bravery. Others require precision and cunning. Make your own levels (using inksMoto - the level editor for xMoto). Similar to these games: xMoto, ElastoMania, trials, mx motoBut in a monster truck instead of a bike :). In the unlightly event you come across a bug or other problem - or even just have a suggestion please e-mail me! (or even ring me). Updated [once in a blue moon] with extra levels and features.Level 1-4 in the "original" pack are quick and easy while you get the hang of the game.Features:-online high score. -4 Wheel drive. -Customizable wheel size. -customizable suspension. -customize controls. -complex interactive levels. -you can load your own levels! -Ice, Grass, Dirt, Bricks and more. -Simple graphics mode for very old/slow phones. -several control options (joystick, touch, keyboard, accelerometer). -realistic variable engine sound. If you encounter an error please email me - I will do everything I can to fix your problem. Please include what phone you have, what version of android, what you were doing, what error messge(if any) you got.

reviews.title: Horrific game
reviews.comment: The controls are indeed a nightmare, I got though  1 level before I got irritate by the controls. It also spams the notification bar. Why would devs think spamming peoples notification bar would a good idea.
reviews.author: Brett Wright

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your time or money
reviews.comment: Terrible controls, makes it unplayable, i don\'t see where all the 5 star reviews came from I could only stomach about 3 levels before I needed to turn it off and write this review, waste of 2 dollars...
reviews.author: zak brown

reviews.comment: Simply brilliant. The best monster truck game out there. Frustratingly tricky stages expect to be on the same level for hours even days.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Super fun and addicting but when I upgraded to full version it only added 3 levels. So add more levels And ill give 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The game is good. But DO NOT buy it. The purchased version only takes away ads and gives only 3 levels. They never respond to e-mails either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Airpush!
reviews.comment: Notifications on a paid app are unacceptable.  Can\'t refund!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bullshit!
reviews.comment: Had the free version, then got an email saying I bought the full version....I didn\'t!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliantly playable. Amazing physics. Can be a bit glitchy but doesn\'t detract from the fun. I need more levels please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best, so addictive, need more lvls!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Theres an awful audio glitch at startup that continues until I force quit. Droid x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good game but no reason to buy, it\'s the exact same as free version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DO NOT
reviews.comment: BUY!!! They say extra levels and no ads. No ads for sure, but exactly the same game as free version but with only 3 more levels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spam on a paid app? Wtf
reviews.comment: Purchased this because description said that the game would be updated\"most days\"with new levels. This was a fib :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it, its really good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome game with great controls. Couldnt get any better!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game, glitchy on mytouch 4G
reviews.comment: Its fun to play, but it glitches.the stars u need to get not showing up, no wheels on the truck, or wheels but no truck, partsof/entire lvl not showin
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Let\'s get a new map pack. For a challenge, try linear maps with no tilt control.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: New update doesnt work on Desire Z, accelerator, brake, tilt and the floor are INVISIBLE!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'m glad I updated, now it won\'t open, lame.
